properties.headerTitle: HOW TO MAKE A PESTO SAUCE
properties.sauceText: To make pesto, combine basil, garlic, Parmesan cheese, olive oil, and pine nuts in a food processor or blender. Blend to a smooth paste. Add parsley if desired.
